page.title: 11Customs, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: { Rogation Sunday}is still celebrated in a little village called Stodmarsh. On{Rogation Sunday}we ask God to bless all his crops such as corn, fruit and rape. As well as all the crops we ask God to bless the water. A collection of people go round the fields with the Rector blessing the crops with people saying little sentences praying for the crops. {Rogation}days are the three days leading up to{Ascension Day.}The three days are Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday. {* * * * In the Autumn we bring produce in from the fields and gardens and we put it into the church. We have a special service called a{Harvest {Festival.
